snippet: Scott M. Stringer wants to use a tool already being used to cut prisoner recidivism to help finance education programs.
lead_paragraph: Scott M. Stringer wants to use a tool already being used to cut prisoner recidivism to help finance education programs.

headline.seo: Manhattan Borough President Seeks Bonds to Expand Head Start
headline.main: Manhattan Borough President Seeks Bonds to Expand Early Education
headline.print_headline: Manhattan Borough President Suggests Social-Impact Bonds for Early Education
